name: Hague Corporate Affairs
goal: Hague Corporate Affairs is a full service communication consultancy bureau that provides clients with strategy and action in an integrated approach to corporate communication and public affairs, in order to strengthen their reputation and achieve their goals. With every issue we look for the right mix of media and communication strategy, stakeholder approach and / or political lobby.
interests: Agriculture, Climate Action, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Fraud prevention, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Energy and climate policy, circular economy package, digital economy, agriculture, innovation and technologies.
customers: Sant'Anna School of Advanced Studies,World Iodine Association (WIA)
